com.github.katjahahn.parser.msdos

Class MSDOSHeader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.katjahahn.parser.Header<MSDOSHeaderKey>
      • com.github.katjahahn.parser.msdos.MSDOSHeader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PEModule

    public class MSDOSHeader
extends Header<MSDOSHeaderKey>
    Fetches values from the MSDOS header of the PE.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int FORMATTED_HEADER_SIZE
      The size of the formatted header is 64 bytes

    • Field Detail

      • FORMATTED_HEADER_SIZE

        public static final int FORMATTED_HEADER_SIZE
        The size of the formatted header is 64 bytes

        Note: The actual header may be larger, containing optional values.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

                               throws java.io.IOException
        Creates and returns an instance of the MSDOSHeader with the given bytes and the file offset of the PE signature.
